Writer: Neal Israel (characters creator), Pat Proft (characters creator), Stephen Curwick
Title: Police Academy 5: Assignment: Miami Beach
Plot: The old Commandant Lassard, leader of the Police Academy (1984), goes to Florida to receive an award. In the city arrives also the cynic Captain Harris who wants to take Lassard's job. ...
Actors: Bubba Smith, David Graf, Michael Winslow, Leslie Easterbrook
